definition: Wang Ying (character in the "Water Margin")
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
hero/outstanding/excellent/(literary) flower/blossom

sentences.english: I haven’t met Wang Ying since last year.
sentences.chinese: 自去年以來我就未遇見過王英。

sentences.english: Li Ming and Wang Ying are two students of Senior Three.
sentences.chinese: 你班李明和王英同學在高三階段有不同的學習方法。

sentences.english: I learned from Wang Ying that you were graduated with high honours from Tsinghua University yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 從王英處得悉您以優異的成績畢業於清華大學。

sentences.english: Wang Ying, it's likely to rain this afternoon.
